This vignette illustrates how the parcels data set works. Currently the methods.string package focuses on address explosion and cleaning.

```{r outlines}
# parcels.address
library(outlines)
outlines <- list()
data.path <- '~/Dropbox/pkg.data/outlines'
outlines$address <- outlines::address(data.path, fresh=FALSE)
outlines$shapes <- outlines::shapes(data.path, fresh=FALSE)
```
